summary:
**Financial Resources and Sanctions Implementation**

* Directs the Committee to review guidelines on exemptions for basic expenses (para 17)
* Encourages States to report on use of funds to prevent terrorism financing (para 18)
* Encourages States to introduce procedures to implement sanctions measures (para 19)
* Stresses that sanctions apply to all forms of financial resources used to support Al-Qaida, Usama bin Laden, and the Taliban (para 20)

**Committee Work and Compliance**

* Directs the Committee to identify possible cases of non-compliance (para 21)
* Requests States to make the Consolidated List available to relevant government offices (para 22)
* Requests the Secretary-General to increase cooperation with international organizations (para 23)

**Taliban and Consolidated List**

* Encourages States to submit names of individuals and entities associated with the Taliban (para 24)
* Directs the Committee to encourage States to provide additional information on listed Taliban individuals and entities (para 25)
* Directs the Committee to consider requests for inclusion on the Consolidated List and petitions for removal (para 26)

**Coordination, Outreach, and Monitoring**

* Reiterates the need for cooperation and information sharing among committees (para 27)
* Reiterates the importance of Committee follow-up with Member States (para 28)
* Encourages Member States to send representatives to meet the Committee (para 29)
* Requests the Committee to report orally to the Council at least every 180 days (para 31)

**Monitoring Team and Reviews**

* Extends the mandate of the Monitoring Team for 18 months (para 32)
* Decides to review the measures described in paragraph 1 in 18 months (para 33)
* Decides to remain actively seized of the matter (para 34)
1735 (2006)

Annex I — Coversheet 

CONSOLIDATED LIST: COVER SHEET FOR MEMBER STATE SUBMISSIONS TO THE COMMITTEE 

**Identifier Information**

* For Individuals: 
  - Surname, First Name, Additional names 
  - Aliases/“Also Known As” (A.K.A.s), 
  - Other nom de guerre, pseudonym 
  - Title, Employment/Occupation 
  - Nationality/Citizenship 
  - Date of Birth, Passport Details 
  - Alternative Dates of Birth, National Identification Number(s) 
  - Place of Birth, Address(es) 
  - Previous Address(es), Gender 
  - Languages spoken, Father’s full name, Mother’s full name 
  - Current location, Previous location(s) 
  - Undertakings and entities owned or controlled
